name: puppeteer
description: Full browser automation via Puppeteer. Navigate pages, take screenshots, fill forms, click elements, and extract content from any website. Useful for scraping, testing web UIs, and automating browser-based workflows.
author: Anthropic
setup_notes: Puppeteer downloads Chromium automatically on first run. No additional setup is required. For headless environments, ensure your system has the required Chromium dependencies installed.
